categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: Vahl was an embodiment of the destructive nature of the dark side of the Force, worshiped as a goddess by members of the Ember of Vahl cult. The goddess was often depicted as a mature female Vahla with black eyes and ash-white hair.

It was thought that the original Vahl was a powerful Force Adept who lead her people to conquer their homeworld several thousand years before the time of the Sith–Imperial War. Because of their destructive tendencies, the Ember of Vahl were decimated by the Jedi Knights. Since this event, the Vahla have traveled the galaxy looking for their lost homeworld, working as pirates, thieves, and bounty hunters.
In the apocryphal novella, Supernatural Encounters: The Trial and Transformation of Arhul Hextrophon by Joseph Bongiorno, it is revealed that Vahl is simply another name for Abeloth.
